column5: Im going to Eagle lake for the first time on july 4. Does anyone have any info on fishing conditions.(species dosent matter) THANKS

Was up to Vermilion Bay Lodge in May fishing wa great. If you have not been there before sure you will enjoy your stay been going there the last 6 years for opening week. I am sure Gord will point you in the right direction if your lucky maybe he will buy you a beer.
